original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2621)@</color>武將揮舞兵器壟罩自己周身向前做短距離衝鋒，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2621)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2621)@</color>The generals swung their weapons to cover themselves and make a short charge forward, with <color=# ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2621)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage to the enemy.
